item.description:
2012 New Haven Food & Wine Festival

 

The New Haven Food & Wine Festival returns this year with the ever-popular Grand Tasting and Ladies Day Luncheon and Fashion Show. 

Grand Tasting- Wednesday, August 22, Session 7, 5:00-7:30pm

The fifth-annual Grand Tasting, hosted by fame cookbook author and chef, Jaques Pepin, returns!  The perennially sold out event will feature dishes from over 20 of New Haven's award-winning, international dining establishments.  Local chefs will offer roving diners a chance to sample an array of menu items complemented by wine pairings.  Participating restaurants for 2012 include 116 Crown, Barcelona, Basta Trattoria, Caseus, The Cask Republic, Claire's Corner Copia, Geronimo, Gilt, Heirloom, Ibiza, John Davenport's, Kitchen Zinc, L'Orci, Miso, Oaxaca Kitchen, Pacifico, Soul de Cuba, Thali, Thali Too, Union League Cafe and Zinc.   Tickets are $125 and include a box seat ticket.    To purchase Grand Tasting tickets, click here

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: NEW HAVEN FOOD & WINE FESTIVAL
